类 ReversedScannerCallable

  • 所有已实现的接口:
    RetryingCallable<Result[]>

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
public class ReversedScannerCallable
extends ScannerCallable
    A reversed ScannerCallable which supports backward scanning.

      • prepare

        public void prepare(boolean reload)
             throws IOException
        从接口复制的说明: RetryingCallable
        Prepare by setting up any connections to servers, etc., ahead of call invocation. TODO: We call prepare before EVERY call. Seems wrong. FIX!!!!
        指定者:
        prepare 在接口中 RetryingCallable<Result[]>
        覆盖:
        prepare 在类中 ScannerCallable
        参数:
        reload - force reload of server location
        抛出:
        IOException
